name: The Shawshank Redemption
description: A banker convicted of uxoricide forms a friendship over a quarter century with a hardened convict, while maintaining his innocence and trying to remain hopeful through simple compassion.

name: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

name: The Dark Knight
description: When a menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman, James Gordon and Harvey Dent must work together to put an end to the madness.

name: The Godfather Part II
description: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

name: 12 Angry Men
description: The jury in a New York City murder trial is frustrated by a single member whose skeptical caution forces them to more carefully consider the evidence before jumping to a hasty verdict.

name: Superbad
description: Two co-dependent high school seniors are forced to deal with separation anxiety after their plan to stage a booze-soaked party goes awry.

name: The Hangover
description: Three buddies wake up from a bachelor party in Las Vegas with no memory of the previous night and the bachelor missing. They must make their way around the city in order to find their friend in time for his wedding.

name: 21 Jump Street
description: A pair of underachieving cops are sent back to a local high school to blend in and bring down a synthetic drug ring.

name: 22 Jump Street
description: After making their way through high school (twice), big changes are in store for officers Schmidt and Jenko when they go deep undercover at a local college.

name: Bruce Almighty
description: A whiny news reporter is given the chance to step into God's shoes.

name: Weapons
description: When all but one child from the same class mysteriously vanish on the same night at exactly the same time, a community is left questioning who or what is behind their disappearance.

name: The Conjuring: Last Rites
description: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren take on one last terrifying case involving mysterious entities they must confront.

name: Sinners
description: Trying to leave their troubled lives behind, twin brothers return to their hometown to start again, only to discover that an even greater evil is waiting to welcome them back.

name: Him
description: A young athlete descends into a world of terror when he's invited to train with a legendary champion whose charisma curdles into something darker.

name: Dracula: A Love Tale
description: After his wife dies, a 15th century prince renounces God and becomes a vampire. Centuries later in 19th century London, he sees a woman resembling his late wife and pursues her, sealing his own fate.

name: The Naked Gun
description: Only one man has the particular set of skills - to lead Police Squad and save the world.

name: One Battle After Another
description: When their evil enemy resurfaces after 16 years, a group of ex-revolutionaries reunite to rescue one of their own's daughter.

name: Superman
description: Superman must reconcile his alien Kryptonian heritage with his human upbringing as reporter Clark Kent. As the embodiment of truth, justice and the human way he soon finds himself in a world that views these as old-fashioned.

name: Nobody 2
description: Suburban dad Hutch Mansell, a former lethal assassin, is pulled back into his violent past after thwarting a home invasion, setting off a chain of events.

name: The Smashing Machine
description: The story of mixed-martial arts and UFC champion, Mark Kerr.
